title: SGIP-4: Decrease the emission rate
body:
## TL;DR
Proposal to decrease the emission rate

## Justification
As the project evolves, we intend to expand on different chains. We foresee that with the current emission rate we won't be able to sustain farms till the time we expand on other chains. To resolve this, we propose to decrease the emission rate to extend days for the farm. After that, we will expand on Avalanche.
author: 0x76d930b9daF4199292A87Fe84A2DF72967FAd725
